name: Friendly Forest Friends
text: Add 1 "Sylvan" card from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase, except during the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from the GY and shuffle any number of "Sylvan" monsters from your GY into your Deck; Special Summon 1 "Sylvan" monster from your Deck with a level equal to the number of monsters shuffled into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Friendly Forest Friends" once per turn.
